TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TypeDelegator extends System.Reflection.TypeInfo

summary.span: 包裝 物件，並將方法委派 (Delegate) 給該 。

span.span: Wraps a object and delegates methods to that .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從這個類型衍生並覆寫只有在您必須提供在中，自訂的成員，再加上程式所需且尚未由任何成員。Derive from this type and override only those members you have to provide customization in, plus any members that are required by your program and not already implemented by . 衍生自並實作大部分的屬性和方法。 derives from and implements most of the properties and methods of . 它會實作，每個成員自動將委派至內部的對應成員物件，提供作為建構函式的引數。For each member it implements, automatically delegates to the corresponding member of an internal object, which is supplied as an argument to the constructor. 此內部物件公開給衍生類別所`protected`欄位。This internal object is exposed to deriving classes by the `protected` field. > [!NOTE] > 某些成員有實作，即使成員本身只會繼承自。Some members of have implementations even though the members themselves are simply inherited from . 在這些情況下，提供實作所覆寫`protected`具有的名稱，結尾為"Impl"的方法。In these cases, the implementation is provided by an overridden `protected` method that has a name that ends in "Impl". 比方說，實作的所有多載提供方法的覆寫方法。For example, the implementation for all overloads of the method is supplied by the overridden method. 這類的實作繼承的屬性並提供的覆寫方法。The implementation for inherited properties such as and is provided by the overridden method. 衍生類別可以提供的公用建構函式物件做為其參數，並只將該物件傳遞至建構函式，或者可以設定內部以其他方式的物件。Deriving classes can provide a public constructor that takes a object as its parameter and simply passes that object to the constructor, or can set the internal object in some other way. 如果衍生類別會使用不會實作成員，則必須覆寫該成員，並提供實作。If a deriving class uses a member that is not implemented by , it must override that member and provide an implementation. 最簡單的實作方式是在內部呼叫相對應的成員所公開物件欄位，但您可以提供任何應用程式所需的實作。The simplest implementation is to call the corresponding member on the internal object exposed by the field, but you can provide any implementation your application requires. 您不需要覆寫這些成員，如果它們不會使用您的應用程式或程式庫函式應用程式會呼叫 (例如，藉由建構函式)。It is not necessary to override these members if they are not used by your application or by library functions your application calls (for example, by the constructor). 下列虛擬方法 (`Overridable`方法，在 Visual Basic 中的) 的不由實作: ， ， ， ， ， ， , , , , , , .The following virtual methods (`Overridable` methods in Visual Basic) of are not implemented by : , , , , , , , , , , , , . 下列虛擬屬性 (`Overridable`在 Visual Basic 中的屬性) 的不由實作: ， ， ， ， ， ， , , , .The following virtual properties (`Overridable` properties in Visual Basic) of are not implemented by : , , , , , , , , , .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式從類別產生根據委派呼叫`Type`物件定義之方法的類別。This constructor is called from a class to generate a delegate based upon the `Type` object for the class defining the method.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Assembly As Assembly
public: virtual property System::Reflection::Assembly ^ Assembly { System::Reflection::Assembly ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得實作型別的組件 (assembly)。

span.span: Gets the assembly of the implemented type.

value.span: 物件，表示實作型別的組件。

span.span: An object representing the assembly of the implemented type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組件是 common language runtime 中的部署單位。Assemblies are the deployment units in the common language runtime. 組件建立的命名空間解析要求，並判斷哪些資源會對外公開、 哪些是可從組件內存取。Assemblies establish the namespace for resolving requests and determine which resources are exposed externally and which are accessible from within the assembly. Common language runtime 可以判斷，並找出任何執行中物件的組件。The common language runtime can determine and locate the assembly for any running object.

span.span: Gets the assembly's fully qualified name.
A containing the assembly's fully qualified name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property BaseType As Type
public: virtual property Type ^ BaseType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前型別的基底型別 (Base Type)。

span.span: Gets the base type for the current type.
The base type for a type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底型別是這個型別直接繼承的類型。The base type is the type from which this type directly inherits. 因為類別類型是所有其他類型的 ultimate 基底類別，它是唯一沒有基底類型的類型。Since the class type is the ultimate base class of all the other types, it is the only type that does not have a base type. 在此情況下，`null`會傳回基底型別`Object`型別。In this case, `null` is returned as the base type of the `Object` type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property FullName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ FullName { System::String ^ get(); };

A containing the type's fully qualified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不會傳回欄位以特定順序，例如依字母順序或依宣告順序。The method does not return fields in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order. 您的程式碼不得相依於欄位會傳回的順序，由於該順序可能有所不同。Your code must not depend on the order in which fields are returned, because that order can vary. 使用`bindingAttr`的。傳回所有的公用和非公用欄位的非公用。Use a `bindingAttr` of .NonPublic to return all public and nonpublic fields.

public: virtual property Guid GUID { Guid get(); };

summary.span: 取得實作型別的 GUID (全域唯一識別項)。

span.span: Gets the GUID (globally unique identifier) of the implemented type.
A GUID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks GUID （全域唯一識別項） 是用來識別類別或介面的 128 位元的唯一識別字串。The GUID (globally unique identifier) is a 128-bit unique identification string used to identify a class or an interface. 它是主要適用於 Microsoft.NET Framework 和 COM 之間的互通性It is primarily useful for interoperability between the Microsoft .NET Framework and COM.

param.name: name
param.span: 要叫用之成員的名稱。

span.span: The name of the member to invoke.

param.span: 這可能是建構函式、方法、屬性或欄位。

span.span: This may be a constructor, method, property, or field.

param.span: 如果傳遞的是空字串 ("")，則會叫用預設成員。

span.span: If an empty string ("") is passed, the default member is invoked.

param.name: invokeAttr
param.span: 引動過程屬性。

span.span: The invocation attribute.

param.span: 這必須是下列其中一個 ：、、、、, 或 。

span.span: This must be one of the following : , , , , , , or .

param.span: 您必須指定適當的引動過程屬性。

span.span: A suitable invocation attribute must be specified.

param.span: 如果要叫用靜態 (Static) 成員，則必須設定 旗標。

span.span: If a static member is to be invoked, the flag must be set.

param.name: binder
param.span: 使用反映來啟用繫結、強制引數的類型、成員的引動過程，和擷取 物件的物件。

span.span: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of objects via reflection.

span.span: If is , the default binder is used.

param.span: 請參閱 。

span.span: See .

param.name: target
param.span: 要在其上叫用指定成員的物件。

span.span: The object on which to invoke the specified member.

param.name: args
param.span: 型別的陣列，包含要叫用的成員參數的數目、順序和型別。

span.span: An array of type that contains the number, order, and type of the parameters of the member to be invoked.

param.span: 如果 包含未初始化的 ，則會被視為具有預設繫結器的空字串，可被擴大為 0、0.0 或字串。

span.span: If contains an uninitialized , it is treated as empty, which, with the default binder, can be widened to 0, 0.0 or a string.

param.name: modifiers
param.span: 與 長度相同的 型別陣列，與元素一起時，表示與要叫用之成員引數相關的屬性。

span.span: An array of type that is the same length as , with elements that represent the attributes associated with the arguments of the member to be invoked.

param.span: 參數在成員的簽章中具有與其相關聯的屬性。

span.span: A parameter has attributes associated with it in the member's signature.

param.span: 針對 ByRef 要使用 ，而 None 則要使用 。

span.span: For ByRef, use , and for none, use .

param.span: 預設繫結器確實與這些相符。

span.span: The default binder does exact matching on these.

param.span: 屬性 (例如 和 ) 不會用於繫結中，且可以使用 來檢視。

span.span: Attributes such as and are not used in binding, and can be viewed using .

param.name: culture
param.span: 的執行個體，用於管理類型的強制型轉。

span.span: An instance of used to govern the coercion of types.

param.span: 例如，要將表示 1000 的字串轉換為 值時，這是必要的，因為 1000 在不同文化特性 (Culture) 中有不同的表示方式。

span.span: This is necessary, for example, to convert a string that represents 1000 to a value, since 1000 is represented differently by different cultures.

param.span: 如果 為 ，則會使用目前執行緒的 的 。

span.span: If is , the for the current thread's is used.

span.span: An array of type containing parameter names that match up, starting at element zero, with the array.

param.span: 陣列中不能有空白位置。

span.span: There must be no holes in the array.

param.span: 如果 .

span.span: If .

param.span: 大於 。

span.span: is greater than .

param.span: ，則會依序填入其餘的參數。

span.span: , the remaining parameters are filled in order.

summary.span: 叫用指定的成員。

span.span: Invokes the specified member.

summary.span: 根據指定繫結器和引動過程屬性的條件約束，所要叫用的方法必須可存取，並提供與指定引數清單最特定的符合項目。

span.span: The method that is to be invoked must be accessible and provide the most specific match with the specified argument list, under the constraints of the specified binder and invocation attributes.

returns.span: ，表示叫用之成員的傳回值。

span.span: An representing the return value of the invoked member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果下列條件成立，就會叫用方法：A method will be invoked if both the following conditions are true: - （除非該成員上定義預設引數），方法宣告中的參數數目會等於指定的引數清單中的引數數目。The number of parameters in the method declaration equals the number of arguments in the specified argument list (unless default arguments are defined on the member). - 每個引數的型別可以轉換為參數的型別繫結器。The type of each arguments can be converted by the binder to the type of the parameter. 繫結器會尋找所有相符的方法。The binder will find all the matching methods. 這些方法會找到根據要求的繫結的類型 (`BindingFlags.MethodInvoke`，`BindingFlags.GetProperties`等等)。These methods are found based upon the type of binding requested (`BindingFlags.MethodInvoke`, `BindingFlags.GetProperties`, and so on). 一組方法會依名稱、 目的引數，以及一組繫結器中所定義的搜尋修飾詞進行篩選。The set of methods is filtered by the name, number of arguments, and a set of search modifiers defined in the binder. 方法選取之後，就會叫用。After the method is selected, it will be invoked. 協助工具會在該點檢查。Accessibility is checked at that point. 搜尋可能會控制哪一組方法會搜尋根據與方法關聯的協助工具屬性。The search may control which set of methods are searched based upon the accessibility attribute associated with the method. 方法會負責選取要叫用方法。The method is responsible for selecting the method to be invoked. 預設繫結器會選取最特定的相符項目。The default binder selects the most specific match. > [!NOTE] > 完全信任程式碼會略過存取限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是說，私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可存取，而且完全受信任的程式碼時，使用反映來叫用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. 目前，`InvokeMember`執行 Microsoft.NET Framework 反映語意的每一種物件。Currently, `InvokeMember` performs the Microsoft .NET Framework reflection semantics for every type of object. 如果依名稱指定的成員是一個陣列，`BindingFlags.GetField`上設定旗標`invokeAttr`，則`args`陣列指定的值是要傳回的項目。If the member specified by name is an array and the `BindingFlags.GetField` flag is set on `invokeAttr`, the `args` array specifies the elements whose values are to be returned. 例如，下列呼叫透過`Type`物件`t`傳回字串陣列 MyArray，也就是呼叫物件的成員的第一個元素的值：For example, the following call through `Type` object `t` returns the value of the first element of the string array MyArray, which is a member of the calling object: `String ret = (String) t.InvokeMember ("MyArray", BindingFlags.GetField, null, this, new Variant[]{0});` 您可以使用`InvokeMember`設定的成員陣列的一個或多個項目。You can use `InvokeMember` to set one or more elements of a member array. 所有的項目會設為相同的值。All elements are set to the same value. `args`陣列必須格式化，如下所示：The `args` array must be formatted as follows: ``` {index1, index2,, value} ``` 例如，若要設定 MyArray 的第一個成員上一個範例中，語法如下所示：For example, to set the first member of MyArray from the previous example, the syntax is as follows: ```csharp t.InvokeMember ("MyArray", BindingFlags.SetField, null, this, new Variant[]{0,"Updated"}); ```

Public Overrides ReadOnly Property MetadataToken As Integer
public: virtual property int MetadataToken { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，用於識別中繼資料 (Metadata) 中的這個實體 (Entity)。

span.span: Gets a value that identifies this entity in metadata.

value.span: 此值與模組結合後，是唯一能識別中繼資料中的實體。

span.span: A value which, in combination with the module, uniquely identifies this entity in metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性取得的權杖可以傳遞至 unmanaged 反映 API。The tokens obtained using this property can be passed to the unmanaged reflection API. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Unmanaged 反映 API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c5bb9de-0cf6-438d-ba47-134e6c775fb8)。For more information, see [Unmanaged Reflection API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c5bb9de-0cf6-438d-ba47-134e6c775fb8).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Module As Module
public: virtual property System::Reflection::Module ^ Module { System::Reflection::Module ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得包含實作型別的模組。

span.span: Gets the module that contains the implemented type.

value.span: 物件，表示實作型別的模組。

span.span: A object representing the module of the implemented type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 模組是載入的單位可以包含類型宣告和實作。A module is a loadable unit that can contain type declarations and implementations. 模組含有足夠的資訊來啟用 common language runtime 在載入模組，請找出所有實作位元。Modules contain enough information to enable the common language runtime to locate all implementation bits when the module is loaded.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得實作型別的名稱 (路徑已移除)。

span.span: Gets the name of the implemented type, with the path removed.
A containing the type's non-qualified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含目前 `TypeDelegator` 名稱的字串。A string containing the name of the current `TypeDelegator`. 只有簡單，不是完整的名稱，會傳回的名稱。Only the simple name, not the fully qualified name, is returned. 若要取得的名稱和路徑，請使用。To get the name and the path, use .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Namespace As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Namespace { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得實作型別的命名空間。

span.span: Gets the namespace of the implemented type.
A containing the type's namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會取得字串，包含目前的命名空間`TypeDelegator`。This property gets a string containing the namespace of the current `TypeDelegator`. 例如，如果`TypeDelegator`已，傳回的命名空間是。For example, if the `TypeDelegator` is , the returned namespace is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TypeHandle As RuntimeTypeHandle
public: virtual property RuntimeTypeHandle TypeHandle { RuntimeTypeHandle get(); };

summary.span: 取得實作型別的內部中繼資料表示的控制代碼。

span.span: Gets a handle to the internal metadata representation of an implemented type.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 型別控制代碼是每個型別相關聯的唯一整數值。A type handle is a unique integer value associated with each type. 在執行階段期間，控制代碼是唯一的。The handle is unique during the runtime.

summary.span: 數值，表示型別資訊。

span.span: A value indicating type information.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property UnderlyingSystemType As Type
public: virtual property Type ^ UnderlyingSystemType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得表示實作型別的基礎 。

span.span: Gets the underlying that represents the implemented type.
The underlying type.
